content: **knitted shawl in drops babymerino the piece is worked top down with wave-pattern ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern bm-106 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** height measured down the middle = approx 33-36 cm width measured along the top = approx 112-128 cm **yarn** drops baby merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100-150 g colour 25 lavender **needles** drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 80 cm **knitting gauge** 24 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm 1 repeat of a 5 measures approx 6 cm in width note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
